patterns: Tell me about the National Museum in Delhi
Entry fee for Delhi’s National Museum
responses: The National Museum, New Delhi, was established in May 1946 based on a design proposed by the Maurice Gwyer Committee. It houses over 200,000 artifacts, covering over five thousand years of Indian cultural heritage. It is open from Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM. The entry fee is 20 INR for adults and free for children up to class 12.

The National Museum in Delhi is one of the largest museums in India, showcasing Indian cultural heritage and art. It is open from Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM. The entry fee is 20 INR for adults.
The National Museum is located in Delhi and displays various aspects of Indian history. It is open from Tuesday to Sunday, and the entry fee is 20 INR for adults.

patterns: Tell me about the Indian Museum in Kolkata
responses: The Indian Museum, Kolkata, was established in 1814 and is the oldest and largest multi-purpose museum in India. It houses rare artifacts, armor, fossils, and Mughal paintings. It is open from Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM. The entry fee is 50 INR for adults and 20 INR for students.
The Indian Museum, Kolkata, is the oldest museum in India. It displays various natural and cultural artifacts. It is open from Tuesday to Sunday.
The Indian Museum is located in Kolkata and has a diverse collection of artifacts, coins, and paintings. The entry fee is 50 INR for adults and 20 INR for students.

patterns: Tell me about Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya in Mumbai
responses: The Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya, formerly known as the Prince of Wales Museum, is located in Mumbai. It showcases Indian art, archaeology, and natural history, with a focus on Maharashtra’s history. The museum is open from Monday to Sunday, 10:15 AM to 6:00 PM. The entry fee is 85 INR for adults and 20 INR for children.

Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Museum, located in Mumbai, exhibits various archaeological and artistic collections. It is open from Monday to Sunday, 10:15 AM to 6:00 PM. The entry fee is 85 INR for adults.
The Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya in Mumbai is a unique collection of Indian art and natural history. The entry fee is 85 INR for adults and 20 INR for children.

patterns: Tell me about Albert Hall Museum in Jaipur
Entry fee for Albert Hall Museum
responses: The Albert Hall Museum, Jaipur, is known for its Indo-Saracenic architecture and extensive collection. It is open daily from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM and 7:00 PM to 10:00 PM. The entry fee is 40 INR for adults and 20 INR for students.
Jaipur’s Albert Hall Museum is known for its architecture and historical collections. It is open daily, and the entry fee is 40 INR for adults.
The Albert Hall Museum, Jaipur, displays traditional Indian art and crafts. It is open daily from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. The entry fee is 40 INR for adults.

patterns: Tell me about Salar Jung Museum in Hyderabad
Entry fee for Salar Jung Museum
responses: The Salar Jung Museum, Hyderabad, features rare art and collections from various civilizations around the world. It is closed on Fridays and open from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM on other days. The entry fee is 20 INR for adults and 15 INR for children.
The Salar Jung Museum in Hyderabad is one of the most famous museums in the city. It is open from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM daily, except on Fridays. The entry fee is 20 INR for adults.
The Salar Jung Museum, Hyderabad, displays an outstanding collection from various world civilizations. The entry fee is 20 INR for adults and 15 INR for children.

patterns: Tell me about Visvesvaraya Industrial and Technological Museum in Bengaluru
responses: The Visvesvaraya Industrial and Technological Museum, Bengaluru, showcases achievements in science and technology. It is open from Monday to Sunday, 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM. The entry fee is 60 INR for adults and 30 INR for children.
The Visvesvaraya Industrial and Technological Museum, Bengaluru, displays various aspects of technology and industry. The entry fee is 60 INR for adults and 30 INR for children.
Bengaluru’s Visvesvaraya Museum highlights various innovations and history in science and technology. It is open daily from 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM.

patterns: Tell me about Government Museum in Chennai
responses: The Government Museum, Chennai, is known for its rich collection of antiquities and numismatics. It is closed on Fridays and open from 9:30 AM to 5:00 PM on other days. The entry fee is 15 INR for adults and 10 INR for children.
Chennai’s Government Museum is famous for its art and archaeology. The entry fee is 15 INR for adults and 10 INR for children. It is open on all days except Friday.
The Government Museum, Chennai, is known for its rich collection of coins and antiquities. It is closed on Fridays and open from 9:30 AM to 5:00 PM on other days.
